org.jetel.data

Class DecimalDataField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.DataField
      • org.jetel.data.DataFieldImpl
        • org.jetel.data.DecimalDataField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>, Numeric

    public class DecimalDataField
extends DataFieldImpl
implements Numeric, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    A class that represents decimal number field (precision, scale pair)
    Since:
    November 30, 2005
    See Also:
    DataFieldMetadata, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DecimalDataField

        public DecimalDataField(DataFieldMetadata _metadata,
                int precision,
                int scale)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        _metadata - Metadata describing field
        precision - integer unscaled value - maximum digits this field can contain
        scale - number of decimal places

      • DecimalDataField

        public DecimalDataField(DataFieldMetadata _metadata,
                int precision,
                int scale,
                boolean plain)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        _metadata - Metadata describing field
        precision - integer unscaled value - maximum digits this field can contain
        scale - number of decimal places
        plain - create plain data field - no formatters,etc. will be assigned/created

      • DecimalDataField

        public DecimalDataField(DataFieldMetadata _metadata,
                Decimal value,
                int precision,
                int scale)
        Parameters:
        _metadata - Metadata describing field
        value - decimal value to be assigned to the field
        precision - integer unscaled value - maximum digits this field can contain
        scale - number of decimal places

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from class: DataField
        An operation which sets/resets field to its initial value (just after it was created by JVM) - it varies depending on type of field.
        Nullable fields are set to NULL, non-nullable are zeroed, if they have default value defined, then default value is assigned.
        Specified by:
        reset in class DataField

      • getValueDuplicate

        public Decimal getValueDuplicate()
        Description copied from class: DataField
        Returns the duplicate of the internal value of the data field. If field's value is deemed to be NULL (isNull() return true) then the returned value is NULL. Otherwise the duplicate of the internal value is converted to appropriate object representation and returned.
        Specified by:
        getValueDuplicate in class DataField
        Returns:
        The Value value
        See Also:
        DataField.getValueDuplicate()

      • toByteBuffer

        public int toByteBuffer(CloverBuffer dataBuffer,
               java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder encoder,
               int maxLength)
                 throws java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException
        If the binary format is set, stores the data accordingly. Call super otherwise.
        Overrides:
        toByteBuffer in class DataFieldImpl
        Parameters:
        dataBuffer - buffer where the field's value is written
        encoder - encoder which is used for string to byte conversion
        maxLength - for string based fields (DataFieldMetadata.isByteBased() == false) maximum number of character written to output buffer; byte based fields can ignore this parameter
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException
